title: Your trusted AI Agent for Law Firms
subtitle: Accelerate client intake and never miss a qualified lead — powered by AI voice agents trained for personal injury law.

mainSection.title: Turn more inbound calls into signed cases
mainSection.subtitle: Buildnow AI helps personal injury law firms automate and scale client intake, lead qualification, and follow-ups — so your team can focus on winning cases, not chasing calls.

bulletPoints.title: AI-powered intake 24/7
bulletPoints.description: Qualify new leads around the clock. Our AI agents ask the right questions, collect detailed case info, and route qualified leads to your intake team — instantly.

bulletPoints.title: Legal research assistance
bulletPoints.description: Access comprehensive case law, statutes, and legal precedents instantly with AI-powered research tools that analyze millions of legal documents in seconds.

bulletPoints.title: Follow-up & lead nurturing
bulletPoints.description: Automate follow-ups for leads who didn’t convert the first time. AI voice agents can re-engage potential clients via outbound calls or texts with personalized scripts.

bulletPoints.title: Appointment booking & CRM updates
bulletPoints.description: AI agents can book consultations, send reminders, and update your intake software (Lead Docket, Filevine, Clio, etc.) — keeping your pipeline full and organized.

ctaSection.title: See Buildnow AI in action
ctaSection.description: Try our personal injury demo — listen to AI agents qualify real leads and respond to common legal intake questions. Just sign in and test it yourself.

secondarySection.title: Let your best intake agent work 24/7
secondarySection.subtitle: Built for busy law firms that value speed, compliance, and client experience

bulletPoints.title: Trained on legal intake workflows
bulletPoints.description: Agents ask the right questions about car accidents, injuries, dates, insurance, and liability — so you never lose a lead to voicemail again.

bulletPoints.title: Time tracking automation
bulletPoints.description: Automatically track billable hours across different cases and clients with AI that categorizes activities and generates detailed time reports for accurate billing.

bulletPoints.title: Respond faster than the competition
bulletPoints.description: AI agents answer every call instantly, follow up in minutes, and escalate only high-intent leads to your team.

bulletPoints.title: Compliant & secure by design
bulletPoints.description: Built with TCPA compliance, HIPAA-aware protocols, and secure CRM integrations — so you can trust AI with sensitive information.

testimonialsSection.title: Trusted by legal professionals
testimonialsSection.subtitle: Law firms of all sizes rely on our AI solutions to improve efficiency and client service.

testimonials.description: How Morrison & Associates reduced document review time by 70% while maintaining accuracy standards.
How Legal Partners LLP improved client response times by 90% with AI-powered communication tools.
How Corporate Law Group streamlined contract generation and reduced drafting costs by 60%.

finalCta.title: Build your team of AI Voice Aagents
finalCta.description: Join forward-thinking law firms using AI to deliver better client outcomes while improving operational efficiency.
